text: The Deserter () is a 1933 Soviet drama movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin.Реалист кинематографа Всеволод ПудовкинКлассик советского кино Всеволод Пудовкин: жизненный путь режиссера It stars Boris Livanov, Vasili Kovrigin, and Aleksandr Chistyakov. ==Actors== *Boris Livanov - Karl Renn *Vasili Kovrigin - Ludwig Zelle *Aleksandr Chistyakov - Fritz Muller *Tamara Makarova - Greta Zelle *Semyon Svashenko - Bruno *Dmitri Konsovsky - Strauss *Yudif Glizer - Marcella Zelle == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1933 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Movies about the labor movement Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Deserter (1933 movie)
